fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Two times per game and once per night, you may visit any two players and electrify them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If an electrified player visits an electrified player, both will be astrally attacked by you.
- If you electrify a player you electrified previously, they will be astrally attacked by you.
- If you killed someone the night before choosing to use your ability you may only visit one player that night instead of two.
